item.title: KOS
item.description: score:109 Chances: Kosmos Energy Ltd. has a strong asset base with production offshore Ghana, Equatorial Guinea, and the U.S. Gulf of Mexico. The company maintains a sustainable exploration program balanced between proven basin infrastructure-led exploration, emerging basins, and frontier basins. Recent private offerings and convertible notes indicate financial flexibility for future growth and development.
